item.title: Les 10 smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid Xiaomi et Samsung se partagent les places populaires
item.description: Pour notre top 10 des smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid, certaines marques prennent le dessus. Au programme de ce top, Samsung et Xiaomi sont omniprésents.

item.title: Cyber Monday les meilleures offres à moins de 100 euros, c’est par ici !
item.description: Le Cyber Monday a débuté et pour les budgets plus restreints qui souhaiteraient tout de même profiter de l’évènement sans dépenser les 100 euros, sachez qu’on trouve de belles offres cotées Tech.

item.title: Generate a timeline of your day, automatically
item.description:
Ever finish a workday and wonder where the time actually went? You know you were busy, but the details are a blur of Slack messages, browser tabs, and half-finished commits. Manually piecing together a timeline feels like tedious admin work. What if your computer could just… tell you?
GitHub Repository https//github.com/JerryZLiu/Dayflow

item.title: Fnac fait -50 % sur ce pack Xiaomi Mix Flip + imprimante photo pour la fin du Black Friday
item.description: Avant de découvrir la deuxième version de ce Mix Flip, Darty offre une remise de quasiment 50 % sur le premier modèle dans un pack contenant une imprimante photo et son papier photo, le tout pour 699 euros au lieu de 1 303 euros.

item.title: Google TV attention si vous utilisez cette alternative à YouTube sans pubs, elle a été infectée par un malware
item.description: Le développeur d'une célèbre alternative à YouTube pour Google TV admet que les dernières versions de l'application contiennent possiblement un malware.

item.title: CVE-2024-56089 An issue in Technitium through v13.2.2 enables attackers to conduct a DNS cache poisoning attack and...
item.description: An issue in Technitium through v13.2.2 enables attackers to conduct a DNS cache poisoning attack and inject fake responses by reviving the birthday attack. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-13129 Improper Enforcement of Behavioral Workflow vulnerability in Seneka Software Hardware Information Te...
item.description: Improper Enforcement of Behavioral Workflow vulnerability in Seneka Software Hardware Information Technology Trade Contracting and Industry Ltd. Co. Onaylarım allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects Onaylarım from 25.09.26.01 through 18112025. | CVSS Score 3.5 (LOW)

item.title: CVE-2025-63520 Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in FeehiCMS 2.1.1 via the id parameter of the User Update f...
item.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in FeehiCMS 2.1.1 via the id parameter of the User Update function (?r=user%2Fupdate). | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-63522 Reverse Tabnabbing vulnerability in FeehiCMS 2.1.1 in the Comments Management function
item.description: Reverse Tabnabbing vulnerability in FeehiCMS 2.1.1 in the Comments Management function | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-63523 FeehiCMS version 2.1.1 fails to enforce server-side immutability for parameters that are presented t...
item.description: FeehiCMS version 2.1.1 fails to enforce server-side immutability for parameters that are presented to clients as "read-only." An authenticated attacker can intercept and modify the parameter in transit and the backend accepts the changes. This can lead to unintended username changes. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-63525 An issue was discovered in Blood Bank Management System 1.0 allowing authenticated attackers to perf...
item.description: An issue was discovered in Blood Bank Management System 1.0 allowing authenticated attackers to perform actions with escalated privileges via crafted request to delete.php. | CVSS Score 9.6 (CRITICAL)

item.title: CVE-2025-63526 A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the Blood Bank Management System within the abs...
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the Blood Bank Management System within the abs.php component. The application fails to properly sanitize or encode user-supplied input before rendering it in response. An attacker can inject malicious JavaScript payloads into the msg parameter, which is then executed in the victim's browser when the page is viewed. | CVSS Score 8.5 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2025-63527 A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the Blood Bank Management System 1.0 within the...
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the Blood Bank Management System 1.0 within the updateprofile.php and hprofile.php components. The application fails to properly sanitize or encode user-supplied input before rendering it in response. An attacker can inject malicious JavaScript payloads into the hname, hemail, hpassword, hphone, hcity parameters, which are then executed in the victim's browser when the page is viewed. | CVSS Score 8.5 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2025-63528 A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the Blood Bank Management System 1.0 within the...
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the Blood Bank Management System 1.0 within the blooddinfo.php component. The application fails to properly sanitize or encode user-supplied input before rendering it in response. An attacker can inject malicious JavaScript payloads into the error parameter, which is then executed in the victim's browser when the page is viewed. | CVSS Score 8.5 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2025-63529 A session fixation vulnerability exists in Blood Bank Management System 1.0 in login.php that allows...
item.description: A session fixation vulnerability exists in Blood Bank Management System 1.0 in login.php that allows an attacker to set or predict a user's session identifier prior to authentication. When the victim logs in, the application continues to use the attacker-supplied session ID rather than generating a new one, enabling the attacker to hijack the authenticated session and gain unauthorized access to the victim's account. | CVSS Score 6.1 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2025-63531 A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the Blood Bank Management System 1.0 within the receiverLogi...
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the Blood Bank Management System 1.0 within the receiverLogin.php component. The application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input in SQL queries, allowing an attacker to inject arbitrary SQL code. By manipulating the remail and rpassword fields, an attacker can bypass authentication and gain unauthorized access to the system. | CVSS Score 10 (CRITICAL)

item.title: CVE-2025-64030 Eximbills Enterprise 4.1.5 (Built on 2020-10-30) is vulnerable to authenticated stored cross-site sc...
item.description: Eximbills Enterprise 4.1.5 (Built on 2020-10-30) is vulnerable to authenticated stored cross-site scripting (CWE-79) via the /EximBillWeb/servlets/WSTrxManager endpoint. Unsanitized user input in the TMPL_INFO parameter is stored server-side and rendered to other users, enabling arbitrary JavaScript execution in their browsers. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: Cyber Monday les ultimes offres sur les airfryers, ampoules connectés, enceintes Amazon Echo, caméras, etc…
item.description: Airfryer, ampoules Philips Hue, enceintes Amazon Echo ou encore caméras de surveillance et serrures connectées… Il reste encore quelques heures pour enrichir son écosystème domotique grâce aux dernières promotions du Cyber Monday. Voici les meilleures offres encore en cours.

item.title: Google Messages change le look des liens et vidéos YouTube, voici à quoi ça va ressembler
item.description: Longtemps peu agréable à l’œil, l'aperçu d'un lien vers une page Web ou une vidéo YouTube devient plus plaisant dans une future mise à jour de Google Messages.

item.title: World of Warcraft pourquoi le housing (logis) arrive-t-il seulement maintenant, et pas il y a 20 ans ?
item.description: C’est la fin de la plus vieille attente de l'histoire de World of Warcraft. Ce 3 décembre 2025, le MMORPG de Blizzard accueille enfin le « housing » (ou « logis ») avec le prélancement de l'extension Midnight. Pourquoi aura-t-il fallu attendre vingt ans avant de pouvoir poser ses valises en Azeroth ?

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2 la Chine répond à Gemini 3 et GPT-5 avec un nouveau modèle surdoué en maths
item.description: Après avoir lancé une version expérimentale de son modèle V3.2 en septembre, DeepSeek annonce le 1ᵉʳ décembre publier deux nouveaux modèles V3.2-Thinking et V3.2Speciale, conçus pour mettre fin à la domination de Gemini 3 Pro. Dans de nombreux tests mathématiques, le modèle chinois bat celui de Google.

item.title: Netflix a caché un vrai numéro de téléphone dans la saison 5 de Stranger Things
item.description: Alors que la saison 5 de Stranger Things cartonne actuellement sur Netflix depuis sa sortie, le 27 novembre 2025, une surprise attend les fans qui souhaiteraient s'immerger encore davantage dans le petit monde de Mike, Dustin, Eleven et les autres un numéro de téléphone un peu spécial.

item.title: Le prix de ce pack Oppo avec un Reno 13 FS 5G et des écouteurs sans fil avec ANC dégringole sous les 345 € pendant le Cyber Monday
item.description: L'Oppo Reno 13 FS est l'ancien représentant du secteur moyen de gamme dans le catalogue de la marque. Robuste et dopé à l'IA, ce smartphone vaut encore le détour. Il est encore plus intéressant quand il se tient aux côtés des true wireless Oppo Enco Buds2 Pro dans un pack à 342 euros au lieu de 402 euros chez plusieurs e-commerçants.

item.title: Voici la moins chère des voitures électriques à plus de 600 km d’autonomie la nouvelle Nissan Leaf
item.description: Quelques mois après la présentation de la troisième génération de Nissan Leaf, le constructeur japonais ouvre le carnet de commandes de sa voiture électrique. Avec un prix d'entrée de 35 300 euros et la version à plus de 600 km d'autonomie facturée 40 300 euros, elle s'avère plutôt bien placée.

item.title: Tier List géante des meilleures voitures électriques et 4 Matinales l’énorme programme Twitch de cette semaine s’annonce bouillant
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du 1er décembre, c’est juste ici  nous vous donnons rendez-vous mardi, mercredi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter des Survoltés/Vroom Awards 2025.

item.title: Un nouveau pays européen instaure une taxe kilométrique sur les voitures électriques pourquoi cette idée pourrait arriver en France
item.description: Après la Suisse, le Royaume-Uni vient de présenter une nouvelle taxe au kilomètre pour les voitures électriques et hybrides. Mise en place en 2028, elle devrait aider à compenser la baisse des taxes prélevées sur l'essence. La France pourrait-elle s'en inspirer ?

item.title: Dommage collatéral de la pénurie de RAM, les cartes mères peinent à trouver preneurs
item.description: La pénurie de mémoire vive et l'impressionnante hausse des prix qui s'ensuit ont un impact que l'on commence à quantifier sur la commercialisation d'autres composants. Parmi les premières concernées, les cartes mères, dont les ventes fléchissent sérieusement.

item.title: CVE-2025-49642 Library loading on AIX Zabbix Agent builds can be hijacked by local users with write access to the /...
item.description: Library loading on AIX Zabbix Agent builds can be hijacked by local users with write access to the /home/cecuser directory. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-49643 An authenticated Zabbix user (including Guest) is able to cause disproportionate CPU load on the web...
item.description: An authenticated Zabbix user (including Guest) is able to cause disproportionate CPU load on the webserver by sending specially crafted parameters to /imgstore.php, leading to potential denial of service. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: Cet outil règle le problème des mots de passe oubliés pour moins d’un euro par mois
item.description: [Deal du jour] Si chaque connexion se transforme en enquête pour retrouver votre mot de passe, un gestionnaire de mots de passe est sûrement l’outil qu’il vous manque. NordPass propose en ce moment une remise exclusive via Numerama.

item.title: Netflix vous oblige à reprendre votre télécommande la diffusion depuis le smartphone, c’est fini
item.description: Netflix plante un nouveau clou dans le cercueil de Chromecast en désactivant la fonctionnalité de diffusion depuis votre téléphone ou tablette. Elle reste cependant disponible sur les anciens appareils compatibles avec Google Cast.

item.title: Cyber Monday VPN 7 offres pour continuer à faire ses achats en ligne en sécurité pour la dernière ligne droite du Black Friday
item.description: Aujourd'hui, les VPN jouent également les prolongations du Black Friday avec des offres qui durent jusqu'au Cyber Monday. NordVPN, ExpressVPN, CyberGhost VPN et les autres grands noms du secteur proposent pour quelques heures encore de belles réductions sur des abonnements de deux ans.

item.title: Le Cyber Monday donne la banane avec Donkey Kong Bananza à -44 % sur Nintendo Switch 2
item.description: Donkey Kong Bananza est l'une des exclusivités de la Switch 2 où le célèbre singe est le héros d'une aventure riche en rebondissements et destruction. Il est accessible pour 49,99 euros au lieu de 89,99 euros sur Rakuten.

item.title: Ce bug de Windows 11 peut vous empêcher de déverrouiller votre PC
item.description: Une mise à jour de Windows 11 entraîne la disparition de l'icône de mot de passe dans les options de connexion de l'écran de verrouillage. Heureusement, il y a une solution.

item.title: Cyber Monday robots aspirateurs, balais, tondeuses… les offres les plus folles à saisir avant demain
item.description: Aspirer, laver, tondre... Ce qui était une corvée devient presque agréable aujourd'hui avec les robots aspirateurs, les aspirateurs balais sans fil ainsi que les robots tondeuses. Le marché fourmille de modèles à différents tarifs, mais les prix deviennent très intéressants avec le Cyber Monday.

item.title: Netflix a trouvé un moyen d’embêter encore plus ses abonnés qui partagent un compte
item.description: Après avoir verrouillé la connexion Netflix sur téléviseur, en exigeant que chaque foyer ait son propre compte, Netflix désactive le système Google Cast dans son application. Il s'agissait d'une des dernières ruses pour regarder un film ou une série en dehors de sa maison.

item.title: Les offres Samsung sont encore plus attractives au Cyber Monday les 13 deals à ne pas rater
item.description: Les meilleures promotions Samsung du Cyber Monday sont listées ici. Du smartphone au téléviseur, en passant par les écrans PC ou les montres connectées, vous trouverez votre bonheur pour renouveler votre matériel.

item.title: Le pack Nintendo Switch 2 avec Mario Kart World revient en promotion pour le Cyber Monday
item.description: Sortie cet été, la Nintendo Switch 2 remet une pièce dans la machine avec un design affûté et des muscles en plus sous la coque. Et pour les amateurs de carapaces bleues et de virages serrés, elle débarque avec Mario Kart World dans les bagages à 449 euros au lieu de 509 euros sur Rakuten (via le vendeur Darty).

item.title: Meilleurs smartphones haut de gamme 2025 nos recommandations et tests
item.description: Vous partez en quête du smartphone de vos rêves et vous avez un budget illimité pour vous l'offrirnbsp? Bienvenue sur notre sélection de smartphones haut de gamme, tous testés et approuvés, pour vous aider dans votre choix.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Book 4 ce performant laptop doté d’un i5 13e gen n’est qu’à 449 € pour le Cyber Monday
item.description: Si vous êtes à la recherche d’un PC portable efficace sans faire exploser votre budget pour ce Cyber Monday, ce bon plan pourrait bien vous intéresser. Le Galaxy Book 4 est un bon laptop équipé d'un i5 de 13e gen qui ne coûte pas plus de 450 euros aujourd'hui.

item.title: Cyber Monday Forfait mobile les promotions chez les opérateurs mobiles durent encore 24 heures ! Voici les 9 meilleures offres
item.description: Plus que quelques heures encore pour profiter des promotions des opérateurs mobiles qui ont dégainé leur série spéciale Black Friday ! Voici quels opérateurs proposent les meilleures offres en ce Cyber Monday !

item.title: CVE-2025-12106 Insufficient argument validation in OpenVPN 2.7_alpha1 through 2.7_rc1 allows an attacker to trigger...
item.description: Insufficient argument validation in OpenVPN 2.7_alpha1 through 2.7_rc1 allows an attacker to trigger a heap buffer over-read when parsing IP addresses | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-27232 An authenticated Zabbix Super Admin can exploit the oauth.authorize action to read arbitrary files f...
item.description: An authenticated Zabbix Super Admin can exploit the oauth.authorize action to read arbitrary files from the webserver leading to potential confidentiality loss. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: France LVMH la mystérieuse demande d'enquête privée sur un média français
item.description: LVMH n'en a visiblement pas tout à fait fini avec les missions de renseignement en eaux troubles. Depuis plusieurs mois, [...]

item.title: France LVMH la mystérieuse demande d'enquête privée sur un média français
item.description: LVMH n'en a visiblement pas tout à fait fini avec les missions de renseignement en eaux troubles. Depuis plusieurs mois, [...]

item.title: Une moto électrique Tesla ? Elon Musk dit toujours non pour une raison très personnelle
item.description: En réponse à une vidéo créée par IA où l'on voit Elon Musk avec une moto futuriste, le patron a réitéré son explication sur pourquoi un deux-roues électrique ne verra jamais le jour chez Tesla.

item.title: Starship vol 12 l’immense défi industriel de SpaceX après l’explosion du booster
item.description: À la suite de l'explosion du tout premier booster de génération « block 3 » (le propulseur B18), SpaceX se trouve dans une course contre-la-montre inhabituelle. Pour tenir la date critique du vol 12 du Starship prévu début 2026, l'entreprise américaine doit réussir une prouesse industrielle.

item.title: L’astuce pour toucher l’iPhone 17 Pro Max moins cher voici le bon plan caché
item.description: C'est la faille du système qu'il faut exploiter ce lundi. SFR propose l'iPhone 17 Pro Max avec une remise globale de 330 €, mais la subtilité, c'est que cela fonctionne avec un forfait sans engagement. Vous prenez le téléphone, la remise, et vous restez libre.

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures montres connectées pas chères en 2025 ?
item.description: Vous voulez une montre connectée, mais vous n'avez pas un budget extensif ? Frandroid vous propose 7 modèles de montres connectées pas chères (sous les 200 euros) pour faire autant plaisir à votre poignet qu'à votre portefeuille.

item.title: CVE-2024-10602 A vulnerability was found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.9 and classified as critical. Affected by this ...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.9 and classified as critical. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /general/approve_center/list/input_form/data_picker_link.php. The manipulation of the argument dataSrc leads to sql injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10605 A vulnerability was found in code-projects Blood Bank Management System 1.0. It has been classified ...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in code-projects Blood Bank Management System 1.0. It has been classified as problematic. This affects an unknown part of the file /file/request.php. The manipulation leads to cross-site request forgery. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 4.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10607 A vulnerability was found in code-projects Courier Management System 1.0. It has been declared as cr...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in code-projects Courier Management System 1.0. It has been declared as critical. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /track-result.php. The manipulation of the argument Consignment leads to sql injection. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 7.3 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2024-10608 A vulnerability was found in code-projects Courier Management System 1.0. It has been rated as criti...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in code-projects Courier Management System 1.0. It has been rated as critical. This issue affects some unknown processing of the file /login.php. The manipulation of the argument txtusername leads to sql injection. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 7.3 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2024-10609 A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in itsourcecode Tailoring Management Sy...
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in itsourcecode Tailoring Management System Project 1.0. This affects an unknown part of the file typeadd.php. The manipulation of the argument sex leads to sql injection. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10610 A vulnerability has been found in ESAFENET CDG 5 and classified as critical. This vulnerability affe...
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in ESAFENET CDG 5 and classified as critical. This vulnerability affects the function delProtocol of the file /com/esafenet/servlet/system/ProtocolService.java. The manipulation of the argument id leads to sql injection. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10611 A vulnerability was found in ESAFENET CDG 5 and classified as critical. This issue affects the funct...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in ESAFENET CDG 5 and classified as critical. This issue affects the function delProtocol of the file /com/esafenet/servlet/system/PrintScreenListService.java. The manipulation of the argument id leads to sql injection. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10612 A vulnerability was found in ESAFENET CDG 5. It has been classified as critical. Affected is the fun...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in ESAFENET CDG 5. It has been classified as critical. Affected is the function removeHookInvalidCourse of the file /com/esafenet/servlet/system/HookInvalidCourseService.java. The manipulation of the argument id leads to sql injection. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10613 A vulnerability was found in ESAFENET CDG 5. It has been declared as critical. Affected by this vuln...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in ESAFENET CDG 5. It has been declared as critical. Affected by this vulnerability is the function delSystemEncryptPolicy of the file /com/esafenet/servlet/system/SystemEncryptPolicyService.java. The manipulation of the argument id leads to sql injection. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10615 A vulnerability was found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.10. It has been rated as critical. Affected by ...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.10. It has been rated as critical. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /general/approve_center/query/list/input_form/delete_data_attach.php. The manipulation of the argument RUN_ID leads to sql injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10616 A vulnerability classified as critical has been found in Tongda OA up to 11.9. This affects an unkno...
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical has been found in Tongda OA up to 11.9. This affects an unknown part of the file /pda/workflow/webSignSubmit.php. The manipulation of the argument saleId leads to sql injection. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10617 A vulnerability classified as critical was found in Tongda OA up to 11.10. This vulnerability affect...
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in Tongda OA up to 11.10. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /pda/workflow/check_seal.php. The manipulation of the argument ID leads to sql injection. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10618 A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.10. Thi...
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.10. This issue affects some unknown processing of the file /pda/reportshop/record_detail.php. The manipulation of the argument repid leads to sql injection. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10619 A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.10. Affected...
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.10. Affected is an unknown function of the file /pda/reportshop/next_detail.php. The manipulation of the argument repid leads to sql injection. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10620 A vulnerability was found in knightliao Disconf 2.6.36. It has been classified as critical. This aff...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in knightliao Disconf 2.6.36. It has been classified as critical. This affects an unknown part of the file /api/config/list of the component Configuration Center. The manipulation leads to improper authentication. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 5.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-21510 Versions of the package sinatra from 0.0.0 are vulnerable to Reliance on Untrusted Inputs in a Secur...
item.description: Versions of the package sinatra from 0.0.0 are vulnerable to Reliance on Untrusted Inputs in a Security Decision via the X-Forwarded-Host (XFH) header. When making a request to a method with redirect applied, it is possible to trigger an Open Redirect Attack by inserting an arbitrary address into this header. If used for caching purposes, such as with servers like Nginx, or as a reverse proxy, without handling the X-Forwarded-Host header, attackers can potentially exploit Cache Poisoning or Routing-based SSRF. | CVSS Score 5.4 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-47939 Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in multiple laser printers and MFPs which implement...
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in multiple laser printers and MFPs which implement Ricoh Web Image Monitor. If this vulnerability is exploited, receiving a specially crafted request created and sent by an attacker may lead to arbitrary code execution and/or a denial-of-service (DoS) condition. As for the details of affected product names and versions, refer to the information provided by the vendors under [References]. | CVSS Score 7.7 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2024-49501 Sysmac Studio provided by OMRON Corporation contains an incorrect authorization vulnerability. If th...
item.description: Sysmac Studio provided by OMRON Corporation contains an incorrect authorization vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker may access the program which is protected by Data Protection function. | CVSS Score 5.7 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-0105 NVIDIA ConnectX Firmware contains a vulnerability where an attacker may cause an improper handling o...
item.description: NVIDIA ConnectX Firmware contains a vulnerability where an attacker may cause an improper handling of insufficient privileges issue. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to denial of service, data tampering, and limited information disclosure. | CVSS Score 8.9 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2024-0106 NVIDIA ConnectX Host Firmware for the BlueField Data Processing Unit (DPU) contains a vulnerability ...
item.description: NVIDIA ConnectX Host Firmware for the BlueField Data Processing Unit (DPU) contains a vulnerability where an attacker may cause an improper handling of insufficient privileges issue. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to denial of service, data tampering, and limited information disclosure. | CVSS Score 8.7 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2024-7424 The Multiple Page Generator Plugin – MPG plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modifica...
item.description: The Multiple Page Generator Plugin – MPG plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of and access to data due to a missing capability check on several functions in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to invoke those functions intended for admin use resulting in subscribers being able to upload csv files and view the contents of MPG projects. | CVSS Score 5.4 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-9655 The Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP – Page Builder Features plugin for WordPress is vulnerabl...
item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP – Page Builder Features plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Icon widget in all versions up to, and including, 6.6.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. | CVSS Score 6.4 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10232 The Group Chat Video Chat by AtomChat plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scri...
item.description: The Group Chat Video Chat by AtomChat plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's atomchat shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. | CVSS Score 6.4 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10651 IDExpert from CHANGING Information Technology does not properly validate a specific parameter in the...
item.description: IDExpert from CHANGING Information Technology does not properly validate a specific parameter in the administrator interface, allowing remote attackers with administrator privileges to exploit this vulnerability to read arbitrary system files. | CVSS Score 4.9 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10652 IDExpert from CHANGING Information Technology does not properly validate a parameter for a specific ...
item.description: IDExpert from CHANGING Information Technology does not properly validate a parameter for a specific functionality, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject JavsScript code and perform Reflected Cross-site scripting attacks. | CVSS Score 6.1 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10653 IDExpert from CHANGING Information Technology does not properly validate a specific parameter in the...
item.description: IDExpert from CHANGING Information Technology does not properly validate a specific parameter in the administrator interface, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to inject and execute OS commands on the server. | CVSS Score 7.2 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2024-10367 The Otter Blocks – Gutenberg Blocks, Page Builder for Gutenberg Editor FSE plugin for WordPress is...
item.description: The Otter Blocks – Gutenberg Blocks, Page Builder for Gutenberg Editor FSE plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via REST API SVG File uploads in all versions up to, and including, 3.0.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the SVG file. | CVSS Score 6.4 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-10654 A vulnerability has been found in TOTOLINK LR350 up to 9.3.5u.6369 and classified as critical. Affec...
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in TOTOLINK LR350 up to 9.3.5u.6369 and classified as critical. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file /formLoginAuth.htm. The manipulation of the argument authCode with the input 1 leads to authorization bypass. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 9.3.5u.6698_B20230810 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. | CVSS Score 5.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2024-7456 A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the `/api/v1/external-users` route of lunary-ai/lunary versi...
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the `/api/v1/external-users` route of lunary-ai/lunary version v1.4.2. The `order by` clause of the SQL query uses `sql.unsafe` without prior sanitization, allowing for SQL injection. The `orderByClause` variable is constructed without server-side validation or sanitization, enabling an attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands. Successful exploitation can lead to complete data loss, modification, or corruption. | CVSS Score 9.8 (CRITICAL)

item.title: CVE-2024-10655 A vulnerability was found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.9. It has been declared as critical. This vulne...
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Tongda OA 2017 up to 11.9. It has been declared as critical. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /pda/reportshop/new.php. The manipulation of the argument repid leads to sql injection. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. | CVSS Score 6.3 (MEDIUM)
